p: 98 patients were included in the study. 8 % of the patients in the Gr. D and 26 % of pateints in gr.C had a posttraumatic stress disorder diagnosis 1 month after hospital discharge (p = 0.03). At 3-month follow-up 17 % of patients in gr.D and 36 % in gr.C were diagnosed PTSD (p = 0,04), after 6 months – 15 % and 30 %, respectively (0,03).
